Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor workspace into modular architecture

- Split 2000+ line Workspace.tsx into organized modules
- Create src/workspace/ folder structure:
  - types/: TypeScript interfaces and type definitions
  - config/: Node configuration data (colors, titles, etc.)
  - components/: Individual node components (11 files)
  - hooks/: useWorkspace hook for state management
  - utils/: Storage utilities for localStorage
- Reduce main Workspace.tsx from ~2000 to ~600 lines
- Enable independent file modifications without breaking others
- Improve code maintainability and testability

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
